mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM gen_table a
WHERE a.del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}
ORDER BY a.name ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO gen_table( id, name, comments, class_name, parent_table, parent_table_fk, created_by, create_date, last_updated_by, last_update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{comments}, #{className}, #{parentTable}, #{parentTableFk}, #{createdBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{lastUpdatedBy.id}, now(), #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE gen_table SET comments = #{comments}, class_name = #{className}, parent_table = #{parentTable}, parent_table_fk = #{parentTableFk}, last_updated_by = #{lastUpdatedBy.id}, last_update_date = now(), remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
